Posts.Content: five years ago l had taxetare just gave me some antihistamines same day just before it laid me out they had to drag it out of my arm and they never gave me anymore it was vile suppose it has moved on now  my breast cancer has come back after five years showing up in my liver going to see onc on thursday dreading him saying more of that bloody stuff think there are other drugs now a bit more gentle vicx
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction to tax

Posts.Content: hi franoli. l've only joined to night be positive.and swear a bit it will make you feel better. l'm about to go through it again l had a mx and lymph node clearance five years ago just ad last mam clear found a lup under arm pit nurse said not to worry well had an ultr sound and they found cancer cells in the lymph node wonderful after five years clear. doctor says he can not under stand it because mam is clear have now got to have scans bet it is in the breast l have left because between ten and twenty 0/0 dont show up. hope to speak to you again  chin up. sophia x
Posts.Title: Worrying scan results

Posts.Content: l'm a second time rounder l had taxatere first time round and they had to take  me off it it l was fitting, but this time my onc is putting me on abraxane which is the same but much milder lonly had seven tax and was cancer free for 5yrs hope this helps ask your onc about abraxane sophie
Posts.Title: Reduction in Docetaxal/Tax has anyone else had this? Will it still...
